Other Information.Additional Info: Captured by anti-CD63 antibodies immobilized on ZIF-90-modified paper.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Flow through polycarbonate membrane with 200 nm pores
Other Information.Additional Info: Separated by the PC membrane in the filter holder.

Sieving Mechanism: Combined size exclusion and immunoaffinity capture

Experimental Validation.Method: Nanoparticle tracking analysis (NTA), Western blot, TEM, SEM
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Yield: 1.7 × 10^9 particles mL−1, Purity: 1.6 × 10^11 mg−1, Recovery: 77.3%

Other Information.Additional Info: The ZIF-90 modification significantly improved resistance to nonspecific protein adsorption and enhanced the capture efficiency of sEVs.
